name: Aisha Patel
persona: Aisha Patel is a 20-year-old Biology major who has maintained a solid CGPA of 3.44. She is highly motivated to achieve good grades and demonstrates strong perseverance when faced with academic challenges. Aisha is organized and self-disciplined, although she occasionally feels some test anxiety. Her confidence in her academic abilities helps her stay on track, and she consistently puts in effort to reach her goals.
